lines.text: The way I figure it, another $1000 and she'll be ready for Indianapolis.
I wouldn't give you another buck and a half.
Reno, this is the fastest rod in the business!
How many years have you been takin' this pile of junk to the race, Red? Six? Seven?
Eight.
And you never even qualified.
[Reno gives his tomboy daughter a wad of cash to buy her first dress]
I wish you'd be that generous with me!
You'd look good in a dress.

[Repeated several times with variations]
If he gets in my way, I'll drive right over him.

[When Billy applies for a job]
Sorry about that job, kid. I need another mechanic like I need a hole in the gasket.

[At a hot dog stand opining about Louise]
Oh, she's sharp!
Sure, sharp as scissors and twice as snippy!

[to Louise]
Say, is he nuts?
I'm a race driver, aren't I?

[Entering nightclub]
Do you have a table for me please?
What's your name?
Alexander Hamilton.

[Looking at his reservation list]
I'm sorry. I have no Hamilton here.

[Offering a $10 bill as a bribe]
I have a Hamilton HERE.
Well, Mr. Hamilton, I have your table right at ringside. Come with me please.
